channel.title: Blogs on ECE3SAT
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on ECE3SAT

item.title: What is a student-designed cubesat made of?
item.description: What is a student-designed cubesat made of? Building a satellite is a big adventure for students like us! Even so this enterprise could seem demanding and perhaps intimidating, we have to manage this just as any other project. And it starts with defining system functionalities. Actually, few core functionalities are a standard in nanosatellites: First of all, as any other device, the satellite needs power to work. Electricity is produced by solar panels and distributed in the whole CubeSat.
